body: As you have seen before i posted a thread telling anyone who was interested to join in on a game of Elimination, sadly not that many people were interested. However those who did join in game me some info on why they did not enjoy Elimination as much as other gametypes, some of this includes: Prolonged games due to hunting, mining, or searching for items. This is why i feel Elimination needs a boost or more loving to create a player base that will return for more once a game ends. Calling all Mods! please take some time to talk about the revamping of Elimination!
